title: PTY spawning fails silently - Claude never starts
description: When running ralph-ui with PTY mode (default from MP-007), Claude subprocess never spawns. Status file shows 'running' but no Claude process exists. Works correctly with --no-pty flag. Need to debug spawnClaudePTY in pty-claude.ts.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Reproduce: ralph-ui --run (without --no-pty) - observe no Claude spawns
Identify why PTY spawn fails silently (no error thrown)
Test: ralph-ui --run spawns Claude correctly with PTY
Test: Output streams through PTY to UI
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-033 PTY spawning fails silently
